content:
From: Gergely Buday <gbuday@gmail.com>
Hi Isabelle users,

is there any project based on Isabelle that would qualify to this
list, at least in development phase?

http://ccgi.scsc.org.uk/tools.php?opt=list

I got this link on the safety-critical mailing list where there are a
lot of people from industry.

http://www.cs.york.ac.uk/hise/sc_list.php

  • Gergely
